import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from '../employee'; import { EmployeeService } from '../employee.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Page } from 'src/app/interface/page'; import { AccountBank } from '../../account-bank/account-bank'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-list', templateUrl: './employee-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-list.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeListComponent implements OnInit{ employees: Employee[] = []; page: Page = {} as Page; constructor(private employeeService: EmployeeService, private router: Router){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.getEmployees(); } private getEmployees(){ this.employeeService.getEmployeesList(10,3).subscribe((data) => { this.employees = data; }); } updateEmployee(id: number){ this.router.navigate(['update-employee', id]); } detailEmployee(id: number){ this.router.navigate(['detail-employee', id]); } deleteEmployee(id: number){ this.employeeService.deleteEmployee(id).subscribe(data => { console.log(data) this.getEmployees(); }) } }
